long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gromments is a comment service that provides a layer of website comments above the control of the website owner, you can comment on any domain or any specific page.

Please ensure you read and understand our privacy policy located at https://gromments.com/privacypolicy

Current Features:
- Gromment on any website domain, path or parameters, you can discuss a domain as a brand or a specific page on the website.
- You can Gromment on other Gromments which starts a thread allowing for separation of Gromment based conversations.
- If you make a mistake, then you can edit a Gromment for five minutes after it was created or until someone Gromments on your Gromment.
- Regret making that Gromment? Then you can just delete your own Gromments any time you like!

Future Features: ( coming soon )
- Blocking accounts so that you no longer see content from a specific Gromment user.
- Up and Down voting to help control useful content.
- Ranking and Stats to make you feel good about yourself and your Gromments...
